title: Ping spikes with usb wifi connection.
body:
Computer to far to be connected by cable so I got a Wireless usb adapter. Ping spikes are anywhere from 30 to 200-350. I have googled some and found possible solutions. One requires me to log onto my router and change the channel I am on and unfortunately I can't do this until tomorrow.

I also found a reddit thread suggesting I go to the cmd promt and type: netsh wlan set autoconfig enabled=no interface="Wireless Network Connection" Unfortunately when I did this I received: There is no such wireless interface on the system, instead of: Auto configuration has been disabled on interface "Wireless Network Connection".

Any suggestions would be greatly appreciated! I got this new computer so I could enjoy gaming more and this lag spike is just making me angry.

replies.body:
A lot of issues regarding increased or inconsistent latency (ping) are usually caused by either problematic network settings or routing issues to our servers. As a starting point, I'd recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) so we can make sure your local settings are configured properly for League.

Hit me up if you still see issues after taking those steps.
